bibl.title: Euripides. Hypsipyle. Text and Annotation based on a Re-examination of the Papyri. (Testi e commenti. 7.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. VI, 852 (= Pack2 438). - Voir pp. 183-218 ("P. Oxy. VI 985. Account of Receipts and Expenditure": édition et analyse du recto de P. Oxy. VI, 852, 90 p.C.); - 219-222 ("Appendix. The Beginning of Papyrus Rolls of Dramatic Texts").
Cockle Walter E.H., Euripides. Hypsipyle. Text and Annotation based on a Re-examination of the Papyri. (Testi e commenti. 7.)
